item.title: 20 Feb 2022 16:10
item.description:
After a good one year away from Whatsapp, I’m back on it . This time however, on better terms.  All thanks to the Mautrix bridge and the Matrix protocol.  Essentially, I can access my whatsapp account data on my regular phone or desktop using … https://t.co/au97I1CNhG

Link to Tweet
